call_title: Why Mine Ergo: Profitability, Sustainability & the Sigmanauts Mining Pool — Ergo Meetup 2025

topics.title: Ergo Introduction and Mining Basics
topics.summary: Overview of Ergo blockchain as a fair launch project with no pre-mine or ICO, built by former Chainlink and Cardano developers. Mining basics explained as providing computational power to secure the network and earn ERG tokens.

topics.title: Autolykos Algorithm and ASIC Resistance
topics.summary: Explanation of Ergo's ASIC-resistant, memory-hard Autolykos algorithm that is GPU-friendly. Discussion of emission schedule changes from 75 ERG to current 12 ERG per block with reductions every three months.

topics.title: Mining Cost Analysis and Profitability Calculations
topics.summary: Detailed breakdown of mining costs including initial investment and operating expenses. Presentation of formula to calculate cost per ERG mined and determine profitability based on electricity rates and hardware efficiency.

topics.title: Long-term Mining Strategy and Emission Reduction Impact
topics.summary: Discussion of long-term considerations including hardware depreciation, ERG price appreciation potential, and tax implications. Analysis of emission reduction schedule impact on scarcity and early miner advantages.

topics.title: GPU Optimization and Mining Hardware Requirements
topics.summary: Technical details on memory-intensive mining with Autolykos, requiring 6GB+ VRAM. Emphasis on power efficiency over maximum hash rate, with optimization techniques like underclocking GPU and overclocking memory for longevity.

topics.title: Virgin Coins and Mining Privacy Benefits
topics.summary: Discussion of mining's privacy advantages through virgin coins - newly mined ERG with no transaction history. This provides anonymity compared to purchasing ERG through exchanges with KYC requirements.

topics.title: ASIC Resistance and Fair Mining Distribution
topics.summary: Explanation of how ASIC resistance ensures fair competition and true decentralization by keeping mining accessible to individual GPU miners. Discussion of algorithm's scheduled memory increases to prevent ASIC development.

topics.title: Mining Hardware Setup Options and Components
topics.summary: Comparison of single GPU versus multi-GPU setups, hardware requirements, and infrastructure needs. Discussion of open-air rigs versus server cases, electrical requirements, and potential dual-use with AI/LLM applications.

topics.title: Heat Management and Cooling Solutions
topics.summary: Detailed discussion of heat management challenges in mining operations. Solutions include basement mining, garage ventilation, heat recapture for home heating, and innovative applications like greenhouse heating for cannabis growing.

topics.title: Electricity Rates and Peak Hour Optimization
topics.summary: Analysis of electricity rate impacts on mining profitability, including off-peak versus peak hour pricing. Strategies for optimizing mining schedules to minimize electricity costs during high-rate periods.

topics.title: PPLNS Pool Mining vs Solo Mining
topics.summary: Explanation of Pay Per Last N Shares (PPLNS) pool mining system versus solo mining. Discussion of share windows, participation calculations, and payout predictability differences between approaches.

topics.title: Sigmonauts Mining Pool Features and DAO Governance
topics.summary: Overview of Sigmonauts mining pool as a DAO-governed pool with variable fees, bonus token distribution, and storage rent sharing. Features include 10,000 ERG treasury, community voting on decisions, and support for Ergo ecosystem development.

topics.title: Storage Rent Distribution and Additional Mining Revenue
topics.summary: Explanation of Ergo's unique storage rent (Demurrage) feature that collects fees from unspent boxes older than four years. Sigmonauts pool distributes this additional revenue proportionally to miners based on their participation.

topics.title: Getting Started with Ergo Mining Setup
topics.summary: Practical guide for starting Ergo mining including wallet setup with Nautilus, mining software selection, pool configuration, and monitoring. Summary of Ergo's advantages including declining emissions, ASIC resistance, and active ecosystem.

topics.title: Future Pool Features and Transaction Stuffing Discussion
topics.summary: Discussion of potential future features for mining pools including transaction stuffing capabilities and integration with mining core. Exploration of allowing miners to include custom transactions in mined blocks.
